description.english: You infiltrated the mansion and assassinated Diana Burnwood
description.german: Sie haben das Anwesen infiltriert und Diana Burnwood eliminiert.
description.french: Vous vous êtes infiltré dans le manoir et avez tué Diana Burnwood.

description.english: You fulfilled Birdie's contract and eliminated The King of Chinatown

description.spanish: Has cumplido el contrato con Birdie y has eliminado al Rey de Chinatown.

description.english: You boarded the train and escaped the Chicago PD
